posts.author: RonBohr
posts.title: Accurate. Now try to explain why.

twitter.content:
Trump is making the Epstein saga worse for himself every single time he talks or posts something on it. 

I genuinely don't get it.

posts.raw_content:
Since President Trump now claims it is all a "hoax", then I suppose that JP Morgan will be clawing back the $290 million dollars it paid out to settle Epstein related lawsuits, and the $75 million it paid to the Virgin Islands for the same reason, right? Somehow I don't remember banks paying out huge sums when any other pedophile got caught.....

No one with a functioning brain believes the bullshit that President Trump is trying to sell us on this topic.

This is more than just about Epstein; This is about trust, and I am sorry to say that President Trump is blowing it in spades, and it pains me to say it, since I have supported him from day 1. 

He, including his son, used this during the campaign, and now has even resorted to telling us to basically fuck off, if we don't like it. 

Well, I don't like it, and now, he gets no benefit of the doubt from me on any topic. I will treat every word from him as no more truthful than any other swamp creature, no more, no less.

I never expected that we would ever get to the bottom of the Epstein affair, given the people involved. But to insult loyal supporters is where I draw the line. 

This doesn't mean I won't still support many of his policies. MAGA will continue with or without him. Nothing can stop that. But he no longer gets the benefit of the doubt from me.
